posts.post_content:
I don't collect these, so I would like to trade for high grade raw cards.
I prefer 1959 and 1960 topps baseball.

I can email scans.

T206 Piedmont 350
Miller Huggins
Portrait
PSA 1

T206 Piedmont 150
George Davis
Chicago
PSA 1

T206 Polar Bear
Hal Chase
Portrait-Blue
PSA 1

I have this Ford that I would be willing to trade if you are interested.  Email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks, Bill

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=288423&d=1506011302[/IMG]

OK, I'm a year off...but I'll trade for this nice Santo RC!

[IMG]https://farm5.staticflickr.com/4378/36820328996_af95012aa1.jpg[/IMG]

Hey Geno.
Nice Santo. I don't really need it, but it is the best offer so far.
Can you give me a day or so?
Lmk Mike

Thanks for the offer Bill.
But I have the Ford already and am looking for higher grade.
Take as long as you want...just PM me.  I'm taking a kid to college this weekend and will forget all about it in a couple days, due to my propensity to drink beer when in Portland.
Does anyone have something from the 50s?

Here are a few cards that I would be willing to trade.  If you have any interest, email me at [url]bdbrownbaseball@gmail.com[/url].  Thanks, Bill
